subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
This is to officially inform you that a payment of 25,000,000.00 GBP
(Twenty Five Million British Pound Sterling) has been approved to be
released to you.
Please acknowledge receipt of this message for more details.
Best Regards,
Mr.Mark Williams

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Williams,

Wow, that's an incredible amount of money! I'm quite surprised to hear this news. Could you please provide more details about why this payment has been approved for me? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Cleveland
